metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14295 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A SQL injection issue in color.php in Cacti 1.2.12 allows an admin to inject SQL via the filter parameter. This can lead to remote command execution because the product accepts stacked queries.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14295` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.1.38+ds1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: cacti package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.38+ds1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
